menu.notloggedin: You are not logged in on cachetur.no
menu.deactivated: The Cachetur Assistant has been deactivated
menu.showonmap: Show caches from cachetur.no on map

comments.description: Enter comment (appended to any existing comments)
comments.error: An error occurred when sending the comment to cachetur.no

priority.error: An error occurred when sending priority to cachetur.no

corrected.title: Button copies posted coordinates to clipboard, so they can be used to mark cache as having updated coordinates.

vgps.sent: The selected caches have been sent to cachetur.no
vgps.error: Something went wrong when sending the selected caches to cachetur.no

alerts.browsemap: Select browse map to add caches from map
alerts.gclh2: You need to disable GCLH2 script to fully use the cachetur assistant
alerts.google: You have to switch from google to leafleat maps in order for the assistant to work

lists.in: This cache is found in these templates, lists or trips that you own or follow on cachetur.no

edit.toggle: Button copies posted coordinates to clipboard, so they can be used to mark cache as having updated coordinates.
edit.open: This feature will open links on cache pages in new tabs.
edit.warning: It will also disable geocaching.com warning about leaving geocachings domain, for external URL's
edit.dt: Tell you if the cache you are currently watching is a new D/T for you, if not tell you how many D/T like this one you have already found.

dt.new: Go find it, it's a new D/T for you !!

refresh.tomany: Too many searches per minute, please try again in
